member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW
member.summary: Contains information specific to an NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification code sent by a toolbar control.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.nmcd
member.summary: structure that contains general custom draw information. TheuItemState member of this structure can be modified so that a toolbar item will be drawn in the specified state without actually changing the item's state.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.hbrMonoDither
member.summary: HBRUSH that the control will use when drawing the background of marked or dithered items. This member is ignored if TBCDRF_NOMARK is returned from the NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification code.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.hbrLines
member.summary: HBRUSH that the control will use when drawing lines on the buttons.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.hpenLines
member.summary: HPEN that the control will use when drawing lines on the buttons.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrText
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the color that the control will use when drawing text on normal items.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrMark
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the background color that the control will use when drawing text on marked items.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrTextHighlight
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the color that the control will use when drawing text on highlighted items.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrBtnFace
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the face color that the control will use when drawing buttons.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrBtnHighlight
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the face color that the control will use when drawing highlighted items. An item is highlighted if it has the TBSTATE_MARKED style and is contained in a toolbar that has the TBSTYLE_FLAT style.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.clrHighlightHotTrack
member.summary: COLORREF that represents the background color that the control will use when drawing text on hot tracked items. This member is ignored if TBCDRF_HILITEHOTTRACK is not returned from the NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification code.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.rcText
member.summary: structure that, on entry, contains the rectangle of the item's text. Theright andbottom members of this structure can be modified to change the width and height, respectively, of the text rectangle of the item.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.nStringBkMode
member.summary: Background mode that the control will use when drawing the text of a nonhighlighted item. This can be either the TRANSPARENT or OPAQUE value.

member.name: NMTBCUSTOMDRAW.nHLStringBkMode
member.summary: Background mode that the control will use when drawing the text of a highlighted item. This can be either the TRANSPARENT or OPAQUE value.

summary.para: Version 6.0 Specifies the distance between the toolbar button image and the text, in logical pixels, for toolbars that have TBSTYLE_LIST style set.

Note that Comctl32.dll version 6 is not redistributable but it is included in Windows or later. To use Comctl32.dll version 6, specify it in a manifest. For more information on manifests, see Enabling Visual Styles.
